AI Description: The 'purrr' package in R is a functional programming toolkit that provides a consistent and easy-to-use set of tools for working with functions and vectors. It simplifies common tasks using functional programming patterns and allows for cleaner, more readable code.
Core Features: Allows Working With Functions & Vectors In A Consistent Manner, Enables Functional Programming Patterns For Tasks Like Iterating, Mapping, & Modifying Data, Facilitates Writing Cleaner & More Readable Code, Supports Parallel Computing & Computation With List-Columns
General Tags: R Package, Functional Programming, Data Manipulation, Data Analysis
